mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Commerce
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Man Reading Newspaper, Port of New Orleans, ca.1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph portrays a man (perhaps a longshoreman) on a pier at Port of New Orleans in New Orleans, Louisiana, ca 1893. Subject is seated on a sawhorse, reading a newspaper. Behind him are stacked bales of cotton Loose cotton can be seen on deck of pier. A series of buildings can be seen in the background. Overall image faded to yellowish brown with some marks in lower right and center left of the photo
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
